column4: ...what is a good program to encode  different fileformats..like M-3 to wave???
soundconvertor is in the repos and does a good job
how would i get it im a linux noob..lol..
have you enabled universe in Synaptic?
run "sudo apt-get install soundconverter" and if it doesnt install, then you dont have universe enabled
got it thanks..i was bein dumb and had synaptic open wihile runnin the command
what does it mean when it says no tags in soundconvertor
means you dont have any infomation tags (artist, album name) in the file
it doesnt say anything..when i hit the convert button nothing happens
have you installed the mp3 codec?
